item.description:
Date: April 28
Day: Sunday
Time: 9:00 AM to 7:30 PM
Where: Cabela’s
475 East Hartford Blvd. North
East Hartford, CT 06118
Cost: $149.00 (plus $15.00 at testing)
Info and registration can be found here: http://www.ranv.org/weekend.html NOTE: THIS class is on SUNDAY (not Saturday as listed on the website)

Halfway down the page on the above web link is the enrollment form, where you can use credit card or PayPal.
If using a card, make sure "Technician Class (Sat)" is checked and "Hartford, CT" is checked. All the boxes have to be filled in.
If using PayPal, enter your name, course location (Hartford) and phone number in the box. When you click "pay now" you get transferred to PayPal where you log in.
Or enrollment over the phone call Mitch at 802-879-6589 weekday afternoon/evenings
PLEASE NOTE: REGISTRATION MUST BE COMPLETED BY MARCH 10. THIS WILL BE OPEN TO THE GENERAL PUBLIC AND THERE IS LIMITED SEATING
Upon enrollment, each student gets an e-mail with course details (time, where, etc.) along with links for the workbook and the on-line class. The course book will be mailed to you in one week. Students then use the 3 items (book, workbook, and on-line course) to come up to speed on the various radio concepts. After the class completion, you will then take the test right there. ($15.00 test fee at time of test)
Lunch and Dinner can be purchased at the Cabela’s Grill.
item.name: ONE DAY HAM RADIO CLASS AND TEST
